IssueSpecification.Name: Fedora Account System groups
IssueSpecification.Description: Fedora Account System groups the owner is member of

Attribute.Name: groups1
Attribute.Description: A bitarray defining in which groups a user is (groups 0-255)

Attribute.Name: groups2
Attribute.Description: A bitarray defining in which groups a user is (groups 256-511)

Attribute.Name: groups3
Attribute.Description: A bitarray defining in which groups a user is (groups 512 - 767)

Attribute.Name: groups4
Attribute.Description: A bitarray defining in which groups a user is (groups 768 - 1023)
